entry.title: Awesome Opentofu Updates on Feb 26 - Mar 03, 2024
entry.content:
Tools / Wrappers

  • Terragrunt (⭐8.8k) - Keep your configurations DRY, work with multiple modules, and manage remote state.
  • tf (⭐79) - Less verbose and more friendly command outputs.

Tools / Registry

  • boring-registry (⭐209) - Boring-registry is an open-source module and provider registry compatible with OpenTofu.
  • hermitcrab (⭐33) - Registry network mirroring service compatible with OpenTofu.
  • terrac (⭐32) - Minimal private module registry compatible with OpenTofu.
  • GitLab Module Registry - Use GitLab projects as a private registry for terraform modules.
  • terralist (⭐415) - Private registry for providers and modules.
  • citizen (⭐641) - Private registry for modules and providers with support for multiple databases and storages.
  • petra (⭐44) - Private registry manager using Google Cloud Storage.
  • terraform-registry (⭐109) - Modules registry with authentication and support for multiple backends.
  • terrareg (⭐303) - Open-source modules registry with UI, optional Git integration and deep analysis.
  • terustry (⭐67) - Proxy registry for providers.
